p: Plants are a potential source of antiviral agents. In India, herbal medicines have proved to intensify therapeutic effects against several viral infections like Dengue virus, HBV, HCV, HSV, HIV, and Influenza virus. These natural agents inhibit viral replication and synthesis. These indigenous plants stand alone in Indian tradition and have been recognized worldwide for its beneficial healing effects ( Ballabh and Chaurasia, 2007; Pandey et al., 2008)..
